name: Tankball [prototype v0]
description:
Control the top-secert TkB-5m tankball to fight agianst incoming enemy tanks in top-down action.  Shoot them down with cannon, machine gun and even squash them by jumping onto the enemy!

The game is a short prototype for concept proving and feedback gathering, should only take a few minutes to finish.

If you like the game...

Do leave a comment! Feedbacks are always appreciated!

If you really, really like the game, consider donating a dollar or two to buy me a drink!
